dc_title_s: Generalized Presettlement Vegetation Types , Circa 1820: Indiana
dc_description_s: LAND_COVER_PRESETTLEMENT_IDNR_IN.SHP is a polygon shapefile showing generalized presettlement vegetation types of Indiana, circa 1820. The work was based on original land survey records and modern soil maps of counties in Indiana. The original published paper map from 1965 (Lindsey) provides five generalized classifications of vegetation types, and the article that contains the map offers descriptions for each classification
dc_creator_sm: Purdue University, Department of Biological Sciences
